name: Sardines with Misua (noodles)
author: Ang Sarap
ingredients:
• 2 cans sardines in tomato sauce

  • 180g misua (flour vermicelli)

  • 1 savoy cabbage, trimmed and chopped

  • 2 cups water

  • 4 cloves garlic, minced

  • 1 small onion, finely chopped

  • 1 tbsp fish sauce

  • freshly ground black pepper

  • oil
instructions:
• In a pot add oil then saut√© garlic and onion.

  • Add sardines and water, bring it to a boil and simmer for 2 minutes.

  • Add the misua and vegetable greens, simmer for 3 minutes.

  • Season with fish sauce and freshly ground black pepper.

  • Serve while hot.
